programme.title: Kung Fu Panda - Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: When Po learns a kung fu move that can erase someone's short-term memory, he takes it too far.

programme.title: Pinguïns van Madagascar
programme.desc: As the vet gathers the penguins to give them a shot, Skipper's fear of needles takes over and he goes on the run. // During a solar eclipse, Phil and Mason convince the bossy Julien that the sky spirits are angry at him. He starts acting extra-nice.

programme.title: Pinguïns van Madagascar
programme.desc: Mort is exposed to Kowalski's super-ray, and he grows super-big and strong. // Marlene gets a new roommate! At first, she's excited to have a new best friend. But her attitude changes when her roommate turns out to have some pretty disgusting habits.

programme.title: Regenboog Vlinder Eenhoorn Kitten
programme.desc: When Felicity visits Mirror Rock with Miguel, she accidentally releases the evil mirror image of herself, Evil Felicity! // Felicity is having a big party to celebrate her "Cat-ceanara," in which she'll officially go from kittenhood to cathood.

programme.title: Regenboog Vlinder Eenhoorn Kitten
programme.desc: In order for a genie to grant more wishes, Felicity must get the last person who found the lamp to complete an unmade wish. // Someone is stealing the gold coins the Saber Tooth Fairy exchanges for loose teeth.

programme.title: Sanjay & Craig
programme.desc: Sanjay and Craig try to find the 'hook' to help a boring puppy find a home. // What starts as Sanjay and Craig playing a schoolyard game turns into a mythic adventure involving a girl in trouble, Darlene and a villain called the Butt Master.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum
programme.desc: When Kyle's old rival, comes to town, he realizes the value of having friends like Fanboy and Chum Chum. // Fanboy and Chum Chum are playing pirates and decide to bury all their favorite possessions so they can then dig up the treasure.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy
programme.desc: When the Chameleon witnesses Snaptrap committing a crime, he agrees to testify against him, and Dudley has to keep him save. // Dudley has to assist the British Undercover Force B.U.F.F. to prevent a Crown Jewel thievery.

programme.title: Winx Club
programme.desc: In Fearwood Forest, the Winx and Specialists fight off werewolves summoned by Selina. After saving the villagers from the attack, they enter the Legendarium World to find final object needed to forge the Legendarium Key.

programme.title: SpongeBob
programme.desc: SpongeBob is een vierkante, gele zeespons die in een grote ananas op de bodem van de oceaan woont. In de plaats Bikinibroek heeft hij het gezelschap van vrienden en van zijn huisdier, Gerrit de slak.

programme.title: SpongeBob
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is een gele zeespons die diep in de oceaan leeft in het onderwaterstadje Bikinibroek. Samen met zijn maatje Patrick de roze zeester beleeft SpongeBob de gekste en spannendste avonturen.

programme.title: Alvin en de Chipmunks
programme.desc: Theodore's new talking-teddy bear is driving Alvin and Simon nuts. So, they decide to rewire the bear's hard drive, so the bear will follow their directions! But when Alvin abuses the privilege, Simon turns the tables on him.

programme.title: Alvin en de Chipmunks
programme.desc: Just like every year, Alvin is none-too thrilled about going back to school. That is until he sees the new Principal and then it's whoa! Love at first sight!

programme.title: Alvin en de Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Theodore disappears from his bed, leaving a blob of sticky, green slime behind, Alvin is POSITIVE that he has been kidnapped by aliens!With the help of Simon and his home-made high-tech gear, they are ready to fight the aliens and save their brother.

programme.title: Les pingouins de Madagascar
programme.desc: It's off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. // The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action star's blockbuster movie!

programme.title: Les pingouins de Madagascar
programme.desc: Private has to get over his fear of roaches and use them to help him free the other penguins from the grip of Officer X. // The penguins discover a kid on a field trip to the zoo has seen one of their covert missions.

programme.title: Huize Herrie
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne komt een meisje tegen in het park, met wie ze goed kan opschieten. Het blijkt dat haar ouders komen kijken naar een leeg appartement in het gebouw waar Ronnie Anne woont.

programme.title: De Casagrandes
programme.desc: Carl's new hit song samples a singing group, but he needs to get their okay before it can play on the radio! // During a snow day, Ronnie Anne and her skater pals must battle for the gym space by playing dodgeball.

programme.desc: SpongeBob is een vierkante, gele zeespons die in een grote ananas op de bodem van de oceaan woont. In de plaats Bikinibroek heeft hij het gezelschap van vrienden en van zijn huisdier, Gerrit de slak.

programme.title: Kamp Koral'
programme.desc: The campers meet two backwoods narwhals named Narlene and Nobby, who treat them to a sweet surprise. // On a rainy day, SpongeBob and his friends entertain themselves indoors with a turbulent game of tag.

programme.title: Rugrats (2021)
programme.desc: Angelica takes advantage of a family problem to make Tommy and Chuckie play a game of house. // Tommy and the babies help Chuckie take care of what he thinks is the last balloon in the whole wide world.

programme.title: Alvin en de Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin is tired of seeing his celebrity status overshadowed by Reality TV stars. So, he decides to become one himself. Just one problem, Alvin has to film Dave without him knowing.

programme.title: Alvin en de Chipmunks
programme.desc: It's the big Bake-Off, and Eleanor has prepared her signature cake and left it out to cool. But Brittany and Alvin come home, and eat the cake without knowing its importance! Can they re-make the cake in time? Or will Eleanor's dreams be reduced to crumbs

programme.title: Alvin en de Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin gets hurt, Simon agrees to face off against Derek on a survival reality show, where there's room for only one winner. Is playing dirty the only way to win?

programme.title: De avonturen van Kid Danger
programme.desc: When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: Sanjay & Craig
programme.desc: When Chicken Chuck adds his own sauce to Penny's hot wings, a heated competition erupts between the longtime friends. // The kids go on a quest to find a legendary pool in the forest.

programme.title: Sanjay & Craig
programme.desc: Sanjay and Craig realize that only by taking off their shirts can they experience the ecstasy of total freedom. // Craig helps Sanjay overcome his fear of embarrassment and reveal his goofy middle name.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. // Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their 'baby'sitter.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln devises a plan to get the best seat in the car for a long, family, road trip. // Lincoln tries to prove he's mature enough to have dinner at the adult table, leaving the kiddie table behind him.

programme.title: De Casagrandes
programme.desc: After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: De Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne finds out her Tio Carlos was a famous skateboarder, she begs him to teach her some new moves. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business that quickly gets out of hand.
